scripts.build:bundle: rm -rf bundle && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production && yarn replace-build-env bundle
scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf cjs && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && yarn replace-build-env cjs
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf esm && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && yarn replace-build-env esm
